verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

But the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> their <S%H113>lord<s%>, <S%H5869>Thinkest<s%> thou that <S%H1732>David<s%> doth <S%H3513>honor<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, in that he hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> unto <S%H1732>thee<s%>? hath not David <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto thee <S%H5668>to<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and to spy it <S%H7270>out<s%>, and to overthrow <S%H2015>it<s%>?

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were become <S%H887>odious<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7936>hired<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H1050>Beth-rehob<s%>, and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> with a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of Tob <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, If the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> be too <S%H2388>strong<s%> for <S%H3444>me<s%>, then thou shalt help <S%H1121>me<s%>; but if the children of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> be too <S%H2388>strong<s%> for <S%H1980>thee<s%>, then I will come and help <S%H3467>thee<s%>.

So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him drew <S%H5066>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%> against the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>: and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And when the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were put to the <S%H5062>worse<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, they <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>; and he <S%H622>gathered<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2431>Helam<s%>. And the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> set themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and fought with <S%H3898>him<s%>.

And the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> the men of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7731>Shobach<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of their <S%H6635>host<s%>, so that he died <S%H4191>there<s%>.

And when all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were put to the <S%H5062>worse<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, they made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H758>them<s%>.
